Posts.EditableText:
(Thanks to Alex for allowing space here for ResponsIF!)

ResponsIF is a "response based" interactive fiction engine, written in JavaScript. It is still a work in progress, but it has advanced to the point that people can begin to use it for something real.

You can read more about it here: https://github.com/jaynabonne/responsif

The docs for it (as PDF) live here: https://github.com/jaynabonne/responsif/tree/master/doc

There is also a blog with ResponsIF related posts here: http://www.aniamosity.net/
Posts.HTML:
(Thanks to Alex for allowing space here for ResponsIF!)

ResponsIF is a "response based" interactive fiction engine, written in JavaScript. It is still a work in progress, but it has advanced to the point that people can begin to use it for something real.

You can read more about it here: https://github.com/jaynabonne/responsif

The docs for it (as PDF) live here: https://github.com/jaynabonne/responsif/tree/master/doc

There is also a blog with ResponsIF related posts here: http://www.aniamosity.net/
